title: OCE FORUM and it state of decay.
body:
Compare to 4 years ago on the old forum, where people can discuss freely without getting their comments delete or banned. The forum was quite lively, lots of views to a thread. 
http://forums.oce.leagueoflegends.com/board/forumdisplay.php?f=59

Now, we barely get pass 70 on average. This new moderating method that seem to cater so heavily on possitive reinforcement; Anything that seem to resemble discontent or arguement, get deleted by the carebear mod. When people say stupid things, you let it go. When people retort back to the stupid comments, they get banned. Lol alrighty then. 

What a great thing you have going for the forum huh? A forum on a state of decline compare to the **past**. yes! instead of growth we're getting less and less people visiting the forum because of the restricted freedom of speech.

replies.body:
I do notice a stark difference in the number of people that post in this forum vs the NA forum. I don't think this has to do with moderators, since similar, but not the same, rules govern both boards. I think it boils down to fewer red posts and fewer people showing up to the boards.

If someone were violating the boards' Universal Rules, then I can see why there'd be action taken against them. Freedom of speech protects you from government action, and not from private institutions. If you start yelling profanities in Denny's (or the Oceanic equivalent), they have the right to not serve you and kick you out.

You're being critical of the moderation, but not violating anything on the boards, except for maybe posting in the wrong section, but I'm not sure where you would post this.

If you do have an issue with moderators here, you might be able to discuss that with moderators on the Boards Discord.

The issues of the boards being "dead" were existent from long, *long* before these "supposed" issues of "biased" comment deletion. It occurred *as* the transition from forums to boards was occurring, not after, and *certainly* not in the last few months. If you bothered to check, you'd notice that *all* (at the very least, the *vast* majority) the significant posters from ~5 months ago still continue to post now.

The fact that you are trying to attribute the recent crack-down on moderation to the fact that the boards are dead just shows that you lack the necessary understanding of the situation to come to a reasonable conclusion.

> restricted freedom of speech

NEWS FLASH: Freedom of speech means the government can't censor you, it does *NOT* (and has *NEVER*) apply to private corporations.
this forums low quality its not in decay, the old forum was better because au played on na but au is a cesspool in and to its own
I thought the boards were less active because the game is turning into a steaming pile of shit, not because of perceived moderation issues.

Notice that around the time where the old forum was laid to rest, was when League started to decline.

I noticed that on the current patch they now even make Baron spawning a huge noise that the whole map can hear.... more dumbing down the game for newbies.
